parameters.name: ExtraBarcode
parameters.description: Add an additional barcode with the original parcel number in the domestic label. Currently only used for DPD RO, DPD BG.

parameters.name: qrcode
parameters.description: Legacy parameter - do not use. Replaced by DropOffType.

parameters.name: DropOffType
parameters.description:
FULL_LABEL: Only the full label is generated (This is the default value for the field DropOffType)

QR_Code: Only the digital label is generated: QR Code and/or pin code (If the BU receiving the request does not support the digital label, an error is generated)

BOTH: If the BU receiving the request supports the digital label then both the full label and QR Code and/or pin code are generated else only the full label is generated

401.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid

parameters.name: ExtraBarcode
parameters.description: Add an additional barcode with the original parcel number in the domestic label. Currently only used for DPD RO, DPD BG.

parameters.name: qrcode
parameters.description: Legacy parameter - do not use. Replaced by DropOffType.

parameters.name: DropOffType
parameters.description:
FULL_LABEL: Only the full label is generated (This is the default value for the field DropOffType)

QR_Code: Only the digital label is generated: QR Code and/or pin code (If the BU receiving the request does not support the digital label, an error is generated)

BOTH: If the BU receiving the request supports the digital label then both the full label and QR Code and/or pin code are generated else only the full label is generated

401.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid
Authentication information is missing or invalid
Authentication information is missing or invalid

parameters.name: LabelPrintFormat
parameters.description: Format of the Label (PDF, EPL, ZPL, TIFF, PPR, SPD, Z2D, THE, XML, XML2D, THEPSG, ZPLPSG, ZPL300, JSON, PS, DATA, CLP, HTML, PNG, GIF, RAW) Some format will not be available in all BU, please contact your local BU for further informations about Label Format availability

parameters.name: LabelPaperFormat
parameters.description: Format of the Label paper (A4, A5, A6, A7) Not available in all BU, please contact your local BU for further informations about Label Paper Format availability.

parameters.name: LabelPrinterStartPosition
parameters.description: Start position for print on A4 paper. Not available in all BU, please contact your local BU for further informations about Label Printer Start Position availability.

parameters.name: LabelPrintResolution
parameters.description: Resolution of the label. Values between 200 and 600 dpi.

401.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid
Authentication information is missing or invalid

qrcode.description: BALTICS specificity, format always in PNG

houseNumber.description: House number (could be included into in the address field and not set).

floor.description: Information on the floor (e.g. if located in a huge office building)

doorCode.description: A code to open the door . It is possible to input 3 different codes separated by a /

building.description: Information of the building (e.g. when located on a big campus).

department.description: Information on the department (e.g. when located in a huge office-building with different departments on the same floor).

country.description: country (ISO 3166). All three ISO standards will be accepted: * ISO 3166-1: 2 Alpha Numerical Characters * ISO 3166-1: 3 Alpha Numerical Characters * ISO 3166-1: 3 Numerical Characters

state.description: State within the country, e.g. CA for California.

siteId.description: SPEEDY specificity. Used for all address types.

siteType.description: SPEEDY specificity. Site type can be used in conjunction with countryId and siteName to find unique site. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

siteName.description: SPEEDY specificity. Site type can be used in conjunction with countryId and siteName to find unique site. Used for all address types.

streetId.description: SPEEDY specificity. Street identifier. If not provided, but street type and street name are provided - the system will try to find unique match by them in site. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

streetType.description: SPEEDY specificity. Street type. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

complexId.description: SPEEDY specificity. Complex identifier. If not provided, but complex type and complex name are provided - the system will try to find unique match by them in site. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

complexType.description: SPEEDY specificity. Complex type. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

complexName.description: SPEEDY specificity. Complex name. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

blockNo.description: SPEEDY specificity. Block No. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

entranceNo.description: SPEEDY specificity. Entrance. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

apartmentNo.description: SPEEDY specificity. Apartment. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

poiId.description: SPEEDY specificity. Point of interest identifier. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

amount.description: The number of decimal will depend of the currency (it could be from 0 to three digit).
The number of decimal will depend of the currency (it could be from 0 to three digit).

collectType.description: Collection type   * `s0` : cash   * `s1` : crossed cheque   * `s2` : credit card   * `s3` : ...   * `s9` : default (depending of the receiving BU)

contactPerson.description: Name of the person to contact

phone1.description: Telephone/Fax number formatted. Has to be encoded in one of the following ways: * XXXXXXXX * +intcodeXXXXXXXX * 00intcodeXXXXXXXX where:  * XXXXXXXX is numeric and means the phone/fax number * intcode is the numeric country code with a length from 1 to 4. Without international code, the phone number has to be understood as a domestic one.'

phone2.description: Telephone/Fax number formatted. Has to be encoded in one of the following ways: * XXXXXXXX * +intcodeXXXXXXXX * 00intcodeXXXXXXXX where:  * XXXXXXXX is numeric and means the phone/fax number * intcode is the numeric country code with a length from 1 to 4. Without international code, the phone number has to be understood as a domestic one.'

fax.description: Telephone/Fax number formatted. Has to be encoded in one of the following ways: * XXXXXXXX * +intcodeXXXXXXXX * 00intcodeXXXXXXXX where:  * XXXXXXXX is numeric and means the phone/fax number * intcode is the numeric country code with a length from 1 to 4. Without international code, the phone number has to be understood as a domestic one.'

originalCustomerId.description: Original customer ID for Integration Customers in certain DPD Business Units

Dimensions.description: Measured 3D dimensions of the individual parcel / whole shipment in centimenters

substanceWeight.description: Net weight of the hazardous substance in Grams.

hazardousWeight.description: Total weight of the hazardous articles in Grams.

packingCode.description: Packing code (see PACKINGCODE). Mandatory in case of hazardous parcel

quantityOfItems.description: Quantity of items per article or invoice line even for low / mid / high value or any type of customer

content.description: Content (Depending of the destination system. Could be cut by some system to the first 35 characters)

netWeight.description: Total weight of the articles in the current line, excluding packaging, in grams.

grossWeight.description: Total weight of the articles including packaging in the current line, in grams.

parcelRank.description: Rank of the parcel within a multi-piece shipment. Set to one for the masterpiece of the shipment or for a single piece. Default = Blank

parcelType.description: Parcel type within the shipment. Different parcel types can't be mixed into one shipment * `D` : Document  * `P` : Non-Doc

customsTerms.description: Parcel type within the shipment Different parcel types can't be mixed into one shipment * `s01` : DAP, not cleared * `s02` : DDP, delivered duty paid (incl. duties and excl. taxes) * `s03` : DDP, delivered duty paid (incl. duties and taxes) * `s05` : ex works (EXW) * `s06` : DAP * `s07` : DAP & DDP enhanced, Duty and taxes were pre-paid by the receiver'

customsPaper.description: Accompanying documents e.g. A | G | B Separator is "|" (a pipe) in case of multiple invoice documents * `A` : commercial invoice * `B` : pro forma invoice * `C` : export declaration * `D` : EUR1 * `E` : EUR2 * `F` : ATR * `G` : delivery note * `H` : third party billing * `I` : T1 document

clearanceStatus.description: Values:   * `N` : No  * `F` : Free  * `E` : Export Cleared  * `T` : Transit Cleared  * `I` : Import Cleared  * `H` : Hybrid

customsInvoice.description: Invoice number Separator is "|" (a pipe) in case of multiple invoice numbers

mrn.description: MRN of the electronic export declaration Remarks: The "|" is the separator between two MRN.

numberOfArticles.description: This is the real number of commodities (ImportTarifCode / ExportTarifCode). The number of Interinvoicelines must equal the NumberOfArticles

destinationCountryRegistration.description: Destination country registration information : Registration number or FDA If destination is DPD UK : Applies to B2B and B2C (Not applicable for C2C) shipments with a goods value under 135 (Excludes shipping cost) and if the Incoterm is not DDP. This is expected to come into force March 19, however no official communication from HMRC yet.

exportReason.description: Reason for export  * `s01` : sale  * `s02` : return/replacement  * `s03` : gift

shipmentContent.description: A detailed description of the overall contents of the consignement (UK->EU export only)

customerDefermentNumber.description: Customer deferment number with can be used for duty tax collection

eori.description: EORI number, dependency of the customs export regime.

taxIdType.description: Type of document if businessType = B, this field becomes mandatory (dependency of the customs export regime) applicable or not according export customs clearance of origin country if businessType = P, this field is empty. Note - Data in this field to be captured based on the rules of each BU.   * `P` : PASSPORT Number   * `C` : CNPJ (ou CPF) Number (Brsil)

taxIdValue.description: Document information. Data in this field to be captured based on the rules of each BU. Become mandatory if IDType is filled

FiscalVatRepresentant.description: Fiscal VAT number. This field should be left Blank / Empty and Only populated with the Fiscal VAT number if applicable / known

messageDestination.description: Destination for the notification, e.g. telephone number, email address, etc.  The required data format for the pro active message types SMS, phone and FAX is as follows: "+international country numberphone number" Has to be encoded in one of the following ways: * XXXXXXXX * +intcodeXXXXXXXX * 00intcodeXXXXXXXX'

messageLanguage.description: Language of the proactive notification 2 (ISO 639-1 alpha 2 code, e.g. DE). MSG are maintain per BU. The list of available language is maintain by the BU which send the message.. Default language will be the one in the BU which send the message.

messageDestType.description: Destination stakeholder of the notification: * `s0` : Receiver / Consignee (default if not provided) * `s1` : Sender / Consignor * `s2` : Requester * `s3` : Other

depot.description: GeoRouting depot code 7 digits - BU code 3 digits + 4 | specificy for BRT - fill with the ID given by your representative

parcelRank.description: Rank of the parcel within a multi-piece shipment. Set to one for the masterpiece of the shipment or for a single piece. Default = Blank

hazardousLimitedQuantities.description: Limited quantities of hazardous goods parcel value.

hazardousPackingCode.description: Packing code * `0A` Thin sheet packing * `0A1` Thin sheet packing with non removable head * `0A2` Thin sheet packing with removable head * `1A` Steel barrel * `1A1` Steel barrel with non removable head * `1A2` Steel barrel with removable head * `1B` Aluminum barrel * `1B1` Aluminum barrel with non removable head * `1B2` Aluminum barrel with removable head * `1H` Plastics barrel * `1H1` Plastics barrel with non removable head * `1H2` Plastics barrel with removable head * `3A` Steel canister * `3A1` Steel canister with non removable head * `3A2` Steel canister with removable head * `3B` Aluminum canister * `3B1`  Aluminum canister with non removable head * `3B2` Aluminum canister with removable head * `3H` Plastics canister * `3H1` Plastics canister with non removable head * `3H2` Plastics canister with removable head * `4A` Steel crates * `4B` Aluminum crate * `4D` Plywood crate * `4G` Cardboard crate * `4H` Plastics crate * `4H1` Plastics crate-plastics expanded * `4H2` Plastics crate-plastics solid * `5H` Plastics bags * `5M` Paper bags * `6H` Combination packing

parcelContent.description: Content (Depending of the destination systems. Could be cut by some system to the first 35 characters) The language recommended in this field is English

reference.description: Field used only by PL customers to transmit the reference associated with the parcel number.

parcelNumberCcKey.description: Control character key compute from the parcel number.

personalDeliveryType.description: Personal delivery type:  * `s1` : department delivery (without personal identification)  * `s2` : personal delivery with personal identification (IDCheck)  * `s3` : personal delivery without personal identification at PUDO (e.g. Direct PUDO delivery)  * `s4` : personal delivery with personal identification at PUDO (e.g. Direct PUDO delivery)  * `s5` : personal delivery with personal identification at PUDO plus ID-Check (e.g. Direct PUDO delivery)  * `s6` : personal delivery with personal identification (ID Check) and recording of the ID.

contact.description: Recipient contact person. Could be different of the consignee's name

pudoId.description: ID number of PUDO point (parcel shop, post office, customer network point, etc., .) This field must use the GeoPost standard PUDO definition (Mandatory for the Cross Border delivery) e.g: CC12345 with: CC: Country Code compliant with ISO 3166-1: 2 Alpha Numerical Characters 12345: PUDO Number'

ID number of PUDO point (parcel shop, post office, customer network point, etc., .) This field must use the GeoPost standard PUDO definition (Mandatory for the Cross Border delivery) e.g: CC12345 with: CC: Country Code compliant with ISO 3166-1: 2 Alpha Numerical Characters 12345: PUDO Number'

addressId.description: sender AddressId (for CZ, SK, SPEEDY, BALTICS)

accountOwner.description: Define the owner of the customer account customer. This owner is responsible to bill the parcel.

customsReference.description: Consignment number for the customs point of view.

mpsCompleteDelivery.description: Values :   * `s0` - Reserved for the future usage (default)   * `s1` - No complete delivery (MPS incomplete)   * `s2` - Complete delivery (MPS complete). It is mandatory for COD

mpsCompleteDeliveryLabel.description: Defines if the label for complete delivery is printed for pickup. Default value is false.

customerBillingReference.description: Customer reference for billing or clearing

numberOfParcels.description: Number of parcels per shipment. A 0 value is acceptable in some BUs and will trigger an open multi-piece shipment, with automated or manual consolidation

Shipment.description: Shipment creation from a customer to a BU.

shipmentId.description: Shipment ID Could be the ID of the first parcel of the list (master ID) or could be another ID specially created for that.

shipmentIdCKey.description: Control character key compute from the shipmentId

productCode.description: DPD Product used for the shipment ("101" for DPD CLASSIC, ...)

serviceCode.description: Additional local service code, needed only in certain Business Units

additionalServiceCode.description: DPD Additional Service required for specific services, describing first and last mile handling

exWorksDelivery.description: Specific field for DPD DE. Specifies if the recipient has to pay the consignment.

qrcode.description: BALTICS specificity, format always in PNG

houseNumber.description: House number (could be included into in the address field and not set).

floor.description: Information on the floor (e.g. if located in a huge office building)

doorCode.description: A code to open the door . It is possible to input 3 different codes separated by a /

building.description: Information of the building (e.g. when located on a big campus).

department.description: Information on the department (e.g. when located in a huge office-building with different departments on the same floor).

country.description: country (ISO 3166). All three ISO standards will be accepted: * ISO 3166-1: 2 Alpha Numerical Characters * ISO 3166-1: 3 Alpha Numerical Characters * ISO 3166-1: 3 Numerical Characters

state.description: State within the country, e.g. CA for California.

siteId.description: SPEEDY specificity. Used for all address types.

siteType.description: SPEEDY specificity. Site type can be used in conjunction with countryId and siteName to find unique site. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

siteName.description: SPEEDY specificity. Site type can be used in conjunction with countryId and siteName to find unique site. Used for all address types.

streetId.description: SPEEDY specificity. Street identifier. If not provided, but street type and street name are provided - the system will try to find unique match by them in site. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

streetType.description: SPEEDY specificity. Street type. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

complexId.description: SPEEDY specificity. Complex identifier. If not provided, but complex type and complex name are provided - the system will try to find unique match by them in site. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

complexType.description: SPEEDY specificity. Complex type. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

complexName.description: SPEEDY specificity. Complex name. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

blockNo.description: SPEEDY specificity. Block No. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

entranceNo.description: SPEEDY specificity. Entrance. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

apartmentNo.description: SPEEDY specificity. Apartment. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

poiId.description: SPEEDY specificity. Point of interest identifier. Used for addresses of type 1 (local address).

amount.description: The number of decimal will depend of the currency (it could be from 0 to three digit).
The number of decimal will depend of the currency (it could be from 0 to three digit).

collectType.description: Collection type   * `s0` : cash   * `s1` : crossed cheque   * `s2` : credit card   * `s3` : ...   * `s9` : default (depending of the receiving BU)

contactPerson.description: Name of the person to contact

phone1.description: Telephone/Fax number formatted. Has to be encoded in one of the following ways: * XXXXXXXX * +intcodeXXXXXXXX * 00intcodeXXXXXXXX where:  * XXXXXXXX is numeric and means the phone/fax number * intcode is the numeric country code with a length from 1 to 4. Without international code, the phone number has to be understood as a domestic one.'

Without international code, the phone number has to be understood as a domestic one.'

Without international code, the phone number has to be understood as a domestic one.'

messageDestination.description: Destination for the notification, e.g. telephone number, email address, etc.  The required data format for the pro active message types SMS, phone and FAX is as follows: "+international country numberphone number" Has to be encoded in one of the following ways: * XXXXXXXX * +intcodeXXXXXXXX * 00intcodeXXXXXXXX'

messageLanguage.description: Language of the proactive notification 2 (ISO 639-1 alpha 2 code, e.g. DE). MSG are maintain per BU. The list of available language is maintain by the BU which send the message.. Default language will be the one in the BU which send the message.

shipmentNumbers.description: List of Shipment numbers for the Pickup

items.description: List of Shipment numbers for the Pickup

parcelNumbers.description: List of Parcel Numbers for the PickUp

items.description: List of Parcel Numbers for the PickUp

pickupWeight.description: Weight in grams units without decimal delimiter (e.g. 3000 equals 3kg) of all the parcels that will picked up

parcelMaxWeight.description: Weight in grams units without decimal delimiter (e.g. 3000 equals 3kg) of the heaviest parcel

references.description: Reference of the pickup request, defined by the customer

items.description: Reference of the pickup request, defined by the customer

sendingDepot.description: GeoRouting depot code 7 digits - BU code 3 digits + 4 | specificy for BRT - fill with the ID given by your representative

houseNumber.description: House number (could be included into in the address field and not set).

country.description: country (ISO 3166). All three ISO standards will be accepted: * ISO 3166-1: 2 Alpha Numerical Characters * ISO 3166-1: 3 Alpha Numerical Characters * ISO 3166-1: 3 Numerical Characters

state.description: State within the country, e.g. CA for California.

amount.description: The number of decimal will depend of the currency (it could be from 0 to three digit).

collectType.description: Collection type   * `s0` : cash   * `s1` : crossed cheque   * `s2` : credit card   * `s3` : ...   * `s9` : default (depending of the receiving BU)

weight.description: Weight in grams units without decimal delimiter (e.g. 3000 equals 3kg)

productCode.description: DPD Product used for the shipment ("101" for DPD CLASSIC, ...)

accountOwner.description: Define the owner of the customer account customer. This owner is responsible to bill the parcel.

contactPerson.description: Name of the person to contact

phone1.description: Telephone/Fax number formatted. Has to be encoded in one of the following ways: * XXXXXXXX * +intcodeXXXXXXXX * 00intcodeXXXXXXXX where:  * XXXXXXXX is numeric and means the phone/fax number * intcode is the numeric country code with a length from 1 to 4. Without international code, the phone number has to be understood as a domestic one.'

phone2.description: Telephone/Fax number formatted. Has to be encoded in one of the following ways: * XXXXXXXX * +intcodeXXXXXXXX * 00intcodeXXXXXXXX where:  * XXXXXXXX is numeric and means the phone/fax number * intcode is the numeric country code with a length from 1 to 4. Without international code, the phone number has to be understood as a domestic one.'

fax.description: Telephone/Fax number formatted. Has to be encoded in one of the following ways: * XXXXXXXX * +intcodeXXXXXXXX * 00intcodeXXXXXXXX where:  * XXXXXXXX is numeric and means the phone/fax number * intcode is the numeric country code with a length from 1 to 4. Without international code, the phone number has to be understood as a domestic one.'

accountOwner.description: Define the owner of the customer account customer. This owner is responsible to bill the parcel.

taxIdType.description: Type of document if businessType = B, this field becomes mandatory (dependency of the customs export regime) applicable or not according export customs clearance of origin country if businessType = P, this field is empty. Note - Data in this field to be captured based on the rules of each BU.   * `P` : PASSPORT Number   * `C` : CNPJ (ou CPF) Number (Brsil)

taxIdValue.description: Document information. Data in this field to be captured based on the rules of each BU. Become mandatory if IDType is filled

FiscalVatRepresentant.description: Fiscal VAT number. This field should be left Blank / Empty and Only populated with the Fiscal VAT number if applicable / known

parcelRank.description: Rank of the parcel within a multi-piece shipment. Set to one for the masterpiece of the shipment or for a single piece. Default = Blank

hazardousLimitedQuantities.description: Limited quantities of hazardous goods parcel value.

hazardousPackingCode.description: Packing code * `0A` Thin sheet packing * `0A1` Thin sheet packing with non removable head * `0A2` Thin sheet packing with removable head * `1A` Steel barrel * `1A1` Steel barrel with non removable head * `1A2` Steel barrel with removable head * `1B` Aluminum barrel * `1B1` Aluminum barrel with non removable head * `1B2` Aluminum barrel with removable head * `1H` Plastics barrel * `1H1` Plastics barrel with non removable head * `1H2` Plastics barrel with removable head * `3A` Steel canister * `3A1` Steel canister with non removable head * `3A2` Steel canister with removable head * `3B` Aluminum canister * `3B1`  Aluminum canister with non removable head * `3B2` Aluminum canister with removable head * `3H` Plastics canister * `3H1` Plastics canister with non removable head * `3H2` Plastics canister with removable head * `4A` Steel crates * `4B` Aluminum crate * `4D` Plywood crate * `4G` Cardboard crate * `4H` Plastics crate * `4H1` Plastics crate-plastics expanded * `4H2` Plastics crate-plastics solid * `5H` Plastics bags * `5M` Paper bags * `6H` Combination packing

parcelContent.description: Content (Depending of the destination systems. Could be cut by some system to the first 35 characters) The language recommended in this field is English

parcelNumberCcKey.description: Control character key compute from the parcel number.

pudoId.description: ID number of PUDO point (parcel shop, post office, customer network point, etc., .) This field must use the GeoPost standard PUDO definition (Mandatory for the Cross Border delivery) e.g: CC12345 with: CC: Country Code compliant with ISO 3166-1: 2 Alpha Numerical Characters 12345: PUDO Number'
